tr_quotes.quote: Hayırlı eş huzurun başlangıcıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Hz. Ali

tr_quotes.quote: Gerçekten birbirine bağlı bir çift için, gençliğin elden gidişi bir felaket değildir. Birlikte ihtiyarlama tatlılığı, ihtiyarlama acısını unutturur.
tr_quotes.author: Andre Maurois

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanın ömrünün en önemli olayı, iyi bir eş seçmektir.
tr_quotes.author: Caesar Drusus

tr_quotes.quote: Namuslu ve erdemli bir kadınla evlenmek, yaşamın en güvenilir yolunu seçmek demektir.
tr_quotes.author: Cervantes

tr_quotes.quote: Evlilik hiçbir pusulanın işlemediği derin bir okyanustur.
tr_quotes.author: Heinrich Heine

tr_quotes.quote: Evliliği sürdüren vücut değil ruhtur.
tr_quotes.author: Publilius Cyrus

tr_quotes.quote: İyi bir eş seçmek diye bir şey yoktur. Kalbin, ruhun kimi isterse onunla evlenirsin.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Kadın parası için evlenen ruhu ile öder.
tr_quotes.author: Sadi Şirazi

tr_quotes.quote: Evliliğin iyisi olur ama kusursuzu olmaz.
tr_quotes.author: François de La Rochefaucauld

tr_quotes.quote: Evlilik zamanla güçlenen tek bağdır.
tr_quotes.author: Andre Maurois

tr_quotes.quote: Mutlu evlilik kısa gibi gelen uzun bir konuşmaya benzer.
tr_quotes.author: Andre Maurois

tr_quotes.quote: Kadın evlenince iradesini erkek de bencilliğini bırakmalıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Honore de Balzac

tr_quotes.quote: Karı koca arasındaki ilişkiler güzellikten ziyade doğruluğa dayanır.
tr_quotes.author: Honore de Balzac

tr_quotes.quote: Akıllıca bir evlilik yapmak istiyorsan kendi denginle evlen.
tr_quotes.author: P. N. Ovidius

tr_quotes.quote: Her şeyde olduğu gibi evlilikte de iç rahatlığı zenginlikten üstündür.
tr_quotes.author: Jean B. Moliere

tr_quotes.quote: Evlilik fırtınalı bir denizse bekârlık da bulanık bir bataklıktır.
tr_quotes.author: T. L. Peacock

tr_quotes.quote: Canın kadar sevdiğin insanla aile kurabildiysen eğer sen dünyanın en şanslı insanı olabilirsin.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Başarısızlığa uğrayan evlilik değil evlenen insanlardır.
tr_quotes.author: H. Emerson Fosdick

tr_quotes.quote: Oğlum evleninceye kadar oğlumdur fakat kızım ölünceye kadar kızımdır.
tr_quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

tr_quotes.quote: Kadın yalnız gözle seçilmez onu gözünden çok kulağınla seç.
tr_quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

tr_quotes.quote: Aşk mutluluğunu evlendikten sonra da sürdürebilseydik dünya cennet olurdu.
tr_quotes.author: Jean J. Rousseau

tr_quotes.quote: Kızın iyi bir evlilik yaparsa bir oğul kazanırsın yoksa kızını da kaybedersin.
tr_quotes.author: Bernard Shaw

tr_quotes.quote: Doğru insan her zaman karşına çıkar. Sen yeter ki yüreğini ferah tut.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Evlilik sandviç gibidir içine ne kadar çok şey katarsanız lezzeti o kadar artar.
tr_quotes.author: Henry Boye

tr_quotes.quote: Namuslu ve erdemli bir kadınla evlenmek yaşamın en güvenilir yolunu seçmek demektir.
tr_quotes.author: Cervantes

tr_quotes.quote: Evlenmişsek artık kimse ne erdemlerimizi ne de kusurlarımızı sorar.
tr_quotes.author: Wolfgang Van Goethe

tr_quotes.quote: Evlenirken eş değil, bir dünya seçeriz
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Evlenmeden önce gözünüzü dört açın evlendikten sonra yarısını kapayın.
tr_quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

tr_quotes.quote: İyi bir imanı ve ahlakı olan insanlar evliliğin en önemli hususlarıdır. Her şey gelip geçici iman ve ahlak kalıcıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Evlenme kafese benzer içindekiler çıkmak için dışındakiler girmek için uğraşırlar.
tr_quotes.author: Lady Mary Montagu

tr_quotes.quote: Evlilik hayatında ara sıra kavgalar edilmelidir, çünkü insanlar birbirlerini böyle tanırlar
tr_quotes.author: Goethe

tr_quotes.quote: Evlilik erkeklerin özgürlüklerini kadınların mutluluklarını ortaya koydukları bir piyangodur.
tr_quotes.author: Madame de Rieux

tr_quotes.quote: Nâsip eden Allah mesut da eder, kim bilir...
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Eş seçmek kitap seçmeye benzer iyi tasarlanmış bir kapak ve cilt ilginizi çekebilir içeriği sağlam olmadıkça sonunu getirmek zordur.
tr_quotes.author: Confucius

tr_quotes.quote: Evlilikte başarı aranan niteliklere sahip insan bulmaktan çok aranan niteliklere sahip insan olmaktır.
tr_quotes.author: R. Brickner

tr_quotes.quote: Gerçekten birbirine bağlı bir çift için gençliğin elden gidişi bir felaket değildir. Birlikte ihtiyarlama tatlılığı ihtiyarlama acısını unutturur.
tr_quotes.author: Andre Maurois

tr_quotes.quote: Evliliğinizi iyi sürdürmek istiyorsanız hatalı olduğunuzda itiraf edin haklı olduğunuzda susmayı bilin.
tr_quotes.author: Nash

tr_quotes.quote: Fon transferi için elektronik bankacılıktan hızlı tek yol vardır ve buna evlilik adı verilir.
tr_quotes.author: James Holt McGavran

tr_quotes.quote: Her başarılı erkeğin arkasında onunla gurur duyan bir karısı vardır.
tr_quotes.author: Brooks Hays

tr_quotes.quote: Bir insanın içinde vicdan varsa o insan dünyanın en iyi eşi olabilir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Evlilik, ben diye düşünmeyi bırakıp biz olarak hayata bakabilmektir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Evlenirken kör olanın, evlendikten sonra gözleri açılır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Evlilik geçici duygular ve imkânlar üzerine değil, iman ve ahlak güzelliği üzerine kurulmalıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: İnsan evlendiği kişiye yıllar sonra bile baktığında; Keşke değil iyi ki demeli...
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Evlilik sadece yatağı paylaşmak değildir. Hayatı paylaşmaktır, yükünü hafifletmektir eşinin. Derdine derman olmaktır, düşmeden önce tutmak, düşmüşse tutup kaldırmaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Evlilik bir son değil yeni bir başlangıçtır. Bembeyaz huzurlu bir başlangıçtır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Evlilikte önemli olan haklı olmak değil mutlu olmaktır. Haklı olmak ısrarı; nefsi ve egoyu besler.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Evlenmeden önce evvela gönülde evin çoktan hazır olacak zira gönülde ev yoksa sevdiğin başını nereye koyacak?
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Kadınları evlenilecek ve eğlenilecek diye ayırıp eğlenemediğiniz biriyle evleniyorsunuz ya bitmeyen mutsuzluğunuzun sebebi bu işte...
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Allah evleneceğiniz kişileri çoktan sizler için yazdı. Yapmanız gereken Allah ile olan ilişkiniz üzerinde çalışmaktır. Hazır olduğunuzda size onu gönderecektir. Sadece zaman meselesi..
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Eş dediğin ya arkana geçer namaza durur ya önüne geçer imanın olur.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Hayat su gibi akıp geçer. Bir de bakarsın yanında bir kişi var. O da hayata birlikte başladığın kişi evleneceğin kişi...
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Evleneceğin kişinin cebine bakarsan dünyayı, takvasına bakarsan ahireti kazanırsın.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: İmandan ve iffetten mahrum bir aşk üzerine kurulan evlilik deniz kenarında tuzdan bir direk üzerine kurulan ve zamanla eriyip çöken ev gibidir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Dinine derinden bağlı biriyle evlenin. Çünkü O çocuğunuzun ileride örnek alacağı kişidir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Birbirini sevenler için nikâh kadar güzel bir şey görülmemiştir.
tr_quotes.author: Hz.Muhammed

tr_quotes.quote: Bir kadın 4 şeyi için nikâhladır; soyu, mal varlığı, güzelliği ve dindar olduğu için. Sen dindar olanı seç.  Aksi halde sıkıntıya düşersin.
tr_quotes.author: Buhârî

tr_quotes.quote: Ey gençler topluluğu; Evlenmeye gücü yeten evlensin. Çünkü gözü korur.
tr_quotes.author: Hz.Muhammed

tr_quotes.quote: Kulun ibadeti ancak evlenmekle kemal bulur.
tr_quotes.author: Abdullah Bin Abbas

tr_quotes.quote: Kızlarınızı çirkin insanlarla evlenmeye zorlamayınız. Çünkü onlar da sizin gibi güzeli severler.
tr_quotes.author: Hz.Ömer

tr_quotes.quote: Akıllıca bir evlilik yapmak istiyorsan, kendi denginle evlen.
tr_quotes.author: Ovidius

tr_quotes.quote: Aşk mutluluğunu, evlendikten sonra da sürdürebilseydik, dünya cennet olurdu.
tr_quotes.author: Jean J. Rousseau

tr_quotes.quote: Aşk, ekseriya bir evlilik meyvesidir.
tr_quotes.author: Moliere

tr_quotes.quote: Aynı evde sevdiğin insan ile yaşamak dünyanın en güzel şeylerinden biridir. Evlilik bu yüzden vardır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Bekar erkekler kadınlar hakkında evli erkeklerden daha çok şey bilirler, eğer bilmeselerdi onlar da evlenmiş olurlardı.
tr_quotes.author: Sacha Guitry

tr_quotes.quote: Evliliğe kutsallık veren, aşktır.
tr_quotes.author: Tolstoy

tr_quotes.quote: Bir erkeğin bir kıza söyleyebileceği en güzel söz; Bir dahaki seveceğim kız, bizim kızımız olacak demesidir.
tr_quotes.author: Paul Auster

tr_quotes.quote: Evlilikte en önemli şey anlayıştır. Eşler birbirini anlamalı ve birbirlerine ellerinden gelen tüm desteği göstermelidir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Yaşlılıkta birbirlerinin derdine koşan insanlar evliliğin en örnek çiftleridir. Bu durum insanın içindeki merhameti ortaya çıkarır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: İçinde aşk olan bir evlilik her türlü zorluğun üstesinden gelir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Evlenen insanlar sadece birbirlerinin iyi gününde yanında olmaz. Kötü gününde de yanında dimdik durmalıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanlar hür ve eşit olarak doğarlar, ancak daha sonra bazıları evlenir.
tr_quotes.author: Anton Cehov

tr_quotes.quote: Eve her geldiğinde sevdiğin kadını ya da adamı görüyor olmak dünyanın en mucizevî şeylerinden biridir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Eş seçmek kitap seçmeye benzer, iyi tasarlanmış bir kapak ve cilt ilginizi çekebilir, içeriği sağlam olmadıkça sonunu getirmek zordur.
tr_quotes.author: Konfüçyüs

tr_quotes.quote: Evlendikten sonra erkek ve kadın, yazı-tura gibidir; asla yüz yüze gelmezler, ancak hep beraberdirler.
tr_quotes.author: Hemant Joshi

tr_quotes.quote: Evlenme kafese benzer; içindekiler çıkmak için, dışındakiler girmek için uğraşırlar.
tr_quotes.author: Lady Mary Montagu

tr_quotes.quote: Evlenmeden önce gözünüzü dört açın, evlendikten sonra yarısını kapayın.
tr_quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

tr_quotes.quote: Evlenmeden önce gözlerinizi açık tutunuz. Evlenince ise birini kapatınız.
tr_quotes.author: Balzac

tr_quotes.quote: Evlenmeden önce ne yaptım biliyor musunuz? İstediğim her şeyi.
tr_quotes.author: Henry Youngman

tr_quotes.quote: Evlenmişsek, artık kimse ne erdemlerimizi, ne de kusurlarımızı sorar.
tr_quotes.author: Wolfgang Van Goethe

tr_quotes.quote: Evlenince ne olursa olsun yaşanan her tartışma o evin içinde kalmalıdır. Dışarıda sizi çekemeyen onca insanın ağzına laf vermemek büyük bir başarıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Evliliği sürdüren, vücut değil ruhtur.
tr_quotes.author: Publilius Cyrus

tr_quotes.quote: Evliliğin iyisi olur; ama kusursuzu olmaz.
tr_quotes.author: François de La Rochefaucauld

tr_quotes.quote: Evliliğin, her şeyi kemiren bir canavarla bıkıp usanmadan boğuşması gerekir: Alışkanlık.
tr_quotes.author: Balzac

tr_quotes.quote: Evlilik denen şey tıpkı fare kapanına benzer, içindekiler çıkmak için çabalar, dışındakiler de dört dönerler, içeri girmek için.
tr_quotes.author: Gıovannı Verga

tr_quotes.quote: Evlilik erkeklerin hürriyetyerini, kadınların mutluluklarını ortaya koydukları bir piyangodur.
tr_quotes.author: Madede de Rıeux

tr_quotes.quote: Evlilik fırtınalı bir denizse, bekarlık da bulanık bir bataklıktır.
tr_quotes.author: T. L. Peacock

tr_quotes.quote: Evlilik hayatında ara sıra kavga etmelidir; çünkü insanlar birbirlerini ancak böyle anlarlar.
tr_quotes.author: Wolfgang Van Goethe

tr_quotes.quote: Evlilik hiçbir pusulanın işlemediği derin bir okyanustur.
tr_quotes.author: Heıne

en_quotes.quote: Happy is the man who finds a true friend, and far happier is he who finds that true friend in his wife
en_quotes.author: Franz Schubert

en_quotes.quote: An ideal wife is any woman who has an ideal husband
en_quotes.author: Booth Tarkington

en_quotes.quote: Marriage is good for those who are afraid to sleep alone at night
en_quotes.author: St. Jerome

en_quotes.quote: By all means, marry. If you get a good wife, you'll become happy; if you get a bad one, you'll become a philosopher
en_quotes.author: Socrates

en_quotes.quote: My wife is my soul mate. I can't imagine being without her
en_quotes.author: Matt Damon

en_quotes.quote: A successful marriage requires falling in love many times, always with the same person
en_quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

en_quotes.quote: Love is moral even without legal marriage, but marriage is immoral without love
en_quotes.author: Ellen Key

en_quotes.quote: In a happy marriage it is the wife who provides the climate, the husband the landscape
en_quotes.author: Gerald Brenan

en_quotes.quote: A marriage doesn't have to be perfect, but you can be perfect for each other
en_quotes.author: Jessica Simpson

en_quotes.quote: My most brilliant achievement was my ability to be able to persuade my wife to marry me
en_quotes.author: Winston Churchill

en_quotes.quote: Remember that creating a successful marriage is like farming: you have to start over again every morning
en_quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

en_quotes.quote: Sensual pleasures have the fleeting brilliance of a comet; a happy marriage has the tranquillity of a lovely sunset
en_quotes.author: Ann Landers

en_quotes.quote: Marriage is a journey. It's hills and valleys
en_quotes.author: Eva Amurri

en_quotes.quote: It's tough to stay married. My wife kisses the dog on the lips, yet she won't drink from my glass
en_quotes.author: Rodney Dangerfield

en_quotes.quote: A bride at her second marriage does not wear a veil. She wants to see what she is getting
en_quotes.author: Helen Rowland

en_quotes.quote: Marriage is the most natural state of man, and... the state in which you will find solid happiness
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

en_quotes.quote: As to marriage or celibacy, let a man take which course he will, he will be sure to repent
en_quotes.author: Socrates

en_quotes.quote: Ultimately, my greatest achievement is maintaining my career while sustaining a happy marriage and kids
en_quotes.author: Melina Kanakaredes

en_quotes.quote: All men make mistakes, but married men find out about them sooner
en_quotes.author: Red Skelton

en_quotes.quote: I love being married. It's so great to find that one special person you want to annoy for the rest of your life
en_quotes.author: Rita Rudner

en_quotes.quote: Marriage is like putting your hand into a bag of snakes in the hope of pulling out an eel
en_quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

en_quotes.quote: You can't have a happy family if you don't have a happy marriage
en_quotes.author: Jeremy Sisto

en_quotes.quote: When I'm weak, you can be strong; when I'm strong, you can be weak. That's what I believe marriage is
en_quotes.author: Gisele Bundchen

en_quotes.quote: The secret of a happy marriage remains a secret
en_quotes.author: Henny Youngman

en_quotes.quote: Let the wife make the husband glad to come home, and let him make her sorry to see him leave
en_quotes.author: Martin Luther

en_quotes.quote: When a man opens a car door for his wife, it's either a new car or a new wife
en_quotes.author: Prince Philip

en_quotes.quote: After marriage, most women keep aside their aspirations and dreams as their priorities change
en_quotes.author: Manju Warrier

en_quotes.quote: Marriages, like careers, need constant nurturing... the secret of having it all is loving it all
en_quotes.author: Joyce Brothers

en_quotes.quote: A good marriage would be between a blind wife and a deaf husband
en_quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

en_quotes.quote: Wit is the sudden marriage of ideas which, before their union, were not perceived to have any relation
en_quotes.author: Mark Twain

en_quotes.quote: Love is not weakness. It is strong. Only the sacrament of marriage can contain it
en_quotes.author: Boris Pasternak

en_quotes.quote: The most happy marriage I can picture or imagine to myself would be the union of a deaf man to a blind woman
en_quotes.author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

en_quotes.quote: The great marriages are partnerships. It can't be a great marriage without being a partnership
en_quotes.author: Helen Mirren

en_quotes.quote: There's only one way to have a happy marriage and as soon as I learn what it is I'll get married again
en_quotes.author: Clint Eastwood

en_quotes.quote: May this marriage be full of laughter, our every day in paradise
en_quotes.author: Rumi

en_quotes.quote: A good marriage is different to a happy marriage
en_quotes.author: Debra Winger

en_quotes.quote: A troubled marriage can be as hazardous to physical health as cigarette smoking
en_quotes.author: Robert J. Waldinger

en_quotes.quote: A good husband makes a good wife
en_quotes.author: John Florio

en_quotes.quote: Nobody, man or woman, has ever wrecked a good marriage
en_quotes.author: Jimmy Dean

en_quotes.quote: A journey is like marriage. The certain way to be wrong is to think you control it
en_quotes.author: John Steinbeck

en_quotes.quote: Marriage is like twirling a baton, turning hand springs or eating with chopsticks. It looks easy until you try it
en_quotes.author: Helen Rowland

en_quotes.quote: Whenever a husband and wife begin to discuss their marriage they are giving evidence at a coroner's inquest
en_quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

en_quotes.quote: Love: A temporary insanity curable by marriage
en_quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

en_quotes.quote: A wife lasts only for the length of the marriage, but an ex-wife is there for the rest of your life
en_quotes.author: Jim Samuels

en_quotes.quote: People ask what the secret of a happy marriage is. If there is one, it's 'don't talk about it.'
en_quotes.author: Jane Asher

en_quotes.quote: I had 53 years of happy marriage and two daughters. These were the best things that happened in my life
en_quotes.author: Henry Allingham

en_quotes.quote: In olden times sacrifices were made at the altar - a practice which is still continued
en_quotes.author: Helen Rowland

en_quotes.quote: A good marriage is one which allows for change and growth in the individuals and in the way they express their love
en_quotes.author: Pearl S. Buck

en_quotes.quote: Marriage equality is about more than just marriage. It's about something greater. It's about acceptance
en_quotes.author: Charlize Theron

en_quotes.quote: The moral code of Heaven for both men and women is complete chastity before marriage and full fidelity after marriage
en_quotes.author: Ezra Taft Benson

en_quotes.quote: Don't marry the person you think you can live with; marry only the individual you think you can't live without
en_quotes.author: James Dobson

en_quotes.quote: Many a good hanging prevents a bad marriage
en_quotes.author: William Shakespeare

en_quotes.quote: Marriage is neither heaven nor hell, it is simply purgatory
en_quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

en_quotes.quote: Politics doesn't make strange bedfellows - marriage does
en_quotes.author: Groucho Marx

en_quotes.quote: Bachelors know more about women than married men; if they didn't they'd be married too
en_quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

en_quotes.quote: People might be surprised because I settled for an arranged marriage, but that's what's chosen for us
en_quotes.author: Karan Patel

en_quotes.quote: Keep your eyes wide open before marriage, half shut afterwards
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

en_quotes.quote: Regarding marriage, it - somehow, it didn't happen. One fellow in such a big family not getting married is not an issue
en_quotes.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

en_quotes.quote: Where there's marriage without love, there will be love without marriage
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

en_quotes.quote: I like marriage. The idea
en_quotes.author: Toni Morrison

en_quotes.quote: My marriage is on the rocks again, yeah, my wife just broke up with her boyfriend
en_quotes.author: Rodney Dangerfield

en_quotes.quote: I think that gay marriage should be between a man and a woman
en_quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

en_quotes.quote: There is, hidden or flaunted, a sword between the sexes till an entire marriage reconciles them
en_quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

en_quotes.quote: Never stay in a bad marriage, and don't hang around with psycho coke fiends
en_quotes.author: Joe Rogan

en_quotes.quote: Married men live longer than single men. But married men are a lot more willing to die
en_quotes.author: Johnny Carson

en_quotes.quote: Love, the quest; marriage, the conquest; divorce, the inquest
en_quotes.author: Helen Rowland

en_quotes.quote: Marriage is a wonderful institution, but who would want to live in an institution?
en_quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

en_quotes.quote: If you want to know how your girl will treat you after marriage, just listen to her talking to her little brother
en_quotes.author: Sam Levenson

en_quotes.quote: Love is more pleasant than marriage for the same reason that novels are more amusing than history
en_quotes.author: Nicolas Chamfort

en_quotes.quote: Marriage is the miracle that transforms a kiss from a pleasure into a duty
en_quotes.author: Helen Rowland

en_quotes.quote: Little children are still the symbol of the eternal marriage between love and duty
en_quotes.author: George Eliot

en_quotes.quote: I yearned for a long, happy marriage with one person
en_quotes.author: Ginger Rogers

en_quotes.quote: Marriage: a ceremony in which rings are put on the finger of the lady and through the nose of the gentleman
en_quotes.author: Herbert Spencer

en_quotes.quote: Marriage is give and take. You'd better give it to her or she'll take it anyway
en_quotes.author: Joey Adams

en_quotes.quote: I am a very basic person. I still believe marriage happens only once, and you have to sustain it
en_quotes.author: Anushka Sharma

en_quotes.quote: Courtship is to marriage, as a very witty prologue to a very dull play
en_quotes.author: William Congreve

en_quotes.quote: A successful marriage is an edifice that must be rebuilt every day
en_quotes.author: Andre Maurois

en_quotes.quote: Marriage is a good deal like a circus: there is not as much in it as is represented in the advertising
en_quotes.author: E. W. Howe

en_quotes.quote: I definitely have a happy marriage and family life
en_quotes.author: Viola Davis

en_quotes.quote: I recommend marriage to everyone
en_quotes.author: Divyanka Tripathi

en_quotes.quote: When a man steals your wife, there is no better revenge than to let him keep her
en_quotes.author: Sacha Guitry

en_quotes.quote: Traditional marriage is what should be sanctioned
en_quotes.author: Jeb Bush

en_quotes.quote: Even though marriage is doomed, if you turned it into a job you like and really work at it - it can be salvaged
en_quotes.author: Al Goldstein

en_quotes.quote: Marriage is anti-romantic - husband and wife are terms like 'turkey' and 'goose.' Worse, they denote ownership
en_quotes.author: Thomas McGuane

en_quotes.quote: I believe a marriage is between a man and a woman
en_quotes.author: George W. Bush

en_quotes.quote: Marriage is a series of desperate arguments people feel passionately about
en_quotes.author: Katharine Hepburn

en_quotes.quote: Marriage is marriage. Everybody has problems
en_quotes.author: Mel Gibson

en_quotes.quote: The best way to get most husbands to do something is to suggest that perhaps they're too old to do it
en_quotes.author: Ann Bancroft

en_quotes.quote: All marriages are happy. It's the living together afterward that causes all the trouble
en_quotes.author: Raymond Hull

en_quotes.quote: A psychiatrist asks a lot of expensive questions your wife asks for nothing
en_quotes.author: Joey Adams

en_quotes.quote: Marriages are made in heaven and consummated on Earth
en_quotes.author: John Lyly

en_quotes.quote: Marriage is miserable unless you find the right person that is your soulmate and that takes a lot of looking
en_quotes.author: Marvin Gaye

en_quotes.quote: The one charm about marriage is that it makes a life of deception absolutely necessary for both parties
en_quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

en_quotes.quote: There is nothing in the world like the devotion of a married woman. It is a thing no married man knows anything about
en_quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

en_quotes.quote: One should always be in love. That is the reason one should never marry
en_quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

en_quotes.quote: Marriage is about the most expensive way for the average man to get laundry done
en_quotes.author: Burt Reynolds

en_quotes.quote: In terms of my marriage, you know, falling in love with my husband was by far the best thing that's ever happened to me
en_quotes.author: Caroline Kennedy

en_quotes.quote: Marriage has no guarantees. If that's what you're looking for, go live with a car battery
en_quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

en_quotes.quote: A happy marriage is a long conversation which always seems too short
en_quotes.author: Andre Maurois

en_quotes.quote: How marriage ruins a man! It is as demoralizing as cigarettes, and far more expensive
en_quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

en_quotes.quote: Marriage is a wonderful institution, but who wants to live in an institution?
en_quotes.author: Groucho Marx

en_quotes.quote: Many people spend more time in planning the wedding than they do in planning the marriage
en_quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

en_quotes.quote: I think marriage is beautiful, but I have mixed feelings about it
en_quotes.author: Ileana D'Cruz

en_quotes.quote: The majority of husbands remind me of an orangutan trying to play the violin
en_quotes.author: Honore de Balzac

en_quotes.quote: People today expect too much from marriage. Getting married is really like taking on a big new job
en_quotes.author: Rosamunde Pilcher

en_quotes.quote: I think marriage and live-in relationships aren't really different. It is just a piece of paper that separates the two
en_quotes.author: Ileana D'Cruz

en_quotes.quote: Marriage isn't important for me. It's just a social announcement where we splurge on feeding a lot of people
en_quotes.author: Ileana D'Cruz

en_quotes.quote: Marriage is good enough for the lower classes: they have facilities for desertion that are denied to us
en_quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

en_quotes.quote: If I get married, I want to be very married
en_quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

en_quotes.quote: Friendship is the marriage of the soul, and this marriage is liable to divorce
en_quotes.author: Voltaire

en_quotes.quote: I have yet to hear a man ask for advice on how to combine marriage and a career
en_quotes.author: Gloria Steinem

en_quotes.quote: There is no subject on which more dangerous nonsense is talked and thought than marriage
en_quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

en_quotes.quote: Marriage is popular because it combines the maximum of temptation with the maximum of opportunity
en_quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

en_quotes.quote: I love the concept of togetherness and the entwinement of marriage
en_quotes.author: William Shatner

en_quotes.quote: A wedding is a funeral where you smell your own flowers
en_quotes.author: Eddie Cantor

en_quotes.quote: Marriage is a great institution, but I'm not ready for an institution
en_quotes.author: Mae West

en_quotes.quote: Marriage is the alliance of two people, one of whom never remembers birthdays and the other who never forgets them
en_quotes.author: Ogden Nash

en_quotes.quote: Art is a marriage of the conscious and the unconscious
en_quotes.author: Jean Cocteau

en_quotes.quote: I don't think marriage is a civil right, but I think that being able to transfer property is a civil right
en_quotes.author: Barack Obama

en_quotes.quote: He's the kind of man a woman would have to marry to get rid of
en_quotes.author: Mae West

en_quotes.quote: Marriage is like a cage; one sees the birds outside desperate to get in, and those inside equally desperate to get out
en_quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

en_quotes.quote: I'm not for gay marriage, but I'm not for discriminating against people
en_quotes.author: Joel Osteen

en_quotes.quote: I don't think that a same-sex marriage is the way God intended it to be
en_quotes.author: Joel Osteen

en_quotes.quote: I have not supported same-sex marriage. I have supported civil partnerships and contractual relationships
en_quotes.author: Hillary Clinton

en_quotes.quote: Bachelors have consciences, married men have wives
en_quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

en_quotes.quote: Men have a much better time of it than women. For one thing, they marry later; for another thing, they die earlier
en_quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

en_quotes.quote: Sometimes I bust out and do things so permanent. Like tattoos and marriage
en_quotes.author: Drew Barrymore

en_quotes.quote: Usually, the fairy tale ends with the girl marrying the prince. But mine started as soon as the marriage was over
en_quotes.author: Diane von Furstenberg

en_quotes.quote: The weaker partner in a marriage is the one who loves the most
en_quotes.author: Eleonora Duse

en_quotes.quote: Marriage is an attempt to solve problems together which you didn't even have when you were on your own
en_quotes.author: Eddie Cantor

en_quotes.quote: No person connected with me by blood or marriage will be appointed to office
en_quotes.author: Rutherford B. Hayes

en_quotes.quote: Like a lovely orchid, or anything else that's nurtured, marriage prospers and grows, but if it's ignored, it withers
en_quotes.author: Michael Douglas

en_quotes.quote: Dancing along with family members and old friends, especially during a marriage, is a memorable experience
en_quotes.author: The Great Khali

en_quotes.quote: The Bible is clear - God's definition of marriage is between a man and a woman
en_quotes.author: Billy Graham

en_quotes.quote: May these vows and this marriage be blessed
en_quotes.author: Rumi

en_quotes.quote: Love is often the fruit of marriage
en_quotes.author: Moliere

en_quotes.quote: We want our marriage to be a triumph, not a tragedy
en_quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

en_quotes.quote: It is always incomprehensible to a man that a woman should ever refuse an offer of marriage
en_quotes.author: Jane Austen

en_quotes.quote: A so-called happy marriage corresponds to love as a correct poem to an improvised song
en_quotes.author: Karl Wilhelm Friedrich Schlegel

en_quotes.quote: Marriage? It's like asparagus eaten with vinaigrette or hollandaise, a matter of taste but of no importance
en_quotes.author: Francoise Sagan

en_quotes.quote: But the fact that same-sex marriage is still an issue is insane. Thinking love knows a sex is ridiculous
en_quotes.author: Garret Dillahunt

en_quotes.quote: A sap run is the sweet goodbye of winter. It is the fruit of the equal marriage of the sun and frost
en_quotes.author: John Burroughs

en_quotes.quote: The secret to a long marriage is to stay gone
en_quotes.author: Dolly Parton

en_quotes.quote: Marrying an old bachelor is like buying second-hand furniture
en_quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

en_quotes.quote: Not cohabitation but consensus constitutes marriage
en_quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

en_quotes.quote: Marriage is a wonderful invention: then again, so is a bicycle repair kit
en_quotes.author: Billy Connolly

en_quotes.quote: How hard it is to have the beautiful interdependence of marriage and yet be strong in oneself alone
en_quotes.author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

en_quotes.quote: They dream in courtship, but in wedlock wake
en_quotes.author: Alexander Pope

en_quotes.quote: I only gave out my opinion that same sex marriage is against the law of God
en_quotes.author: Manny Pacquiao

en_quotes.quote: Marrying for love may be a bit risky, but it is so honest that God can't help but smile on it
en_quotes.author: Josh Billings

en_quotes.quote: I married the first man I ever kissed. When I tell this to my children, they just about throw up
en_quotes.author: Barbara Bush

en_quotes.quote: Well married a person has wings, poorly married shackles
en_quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

en_quotes.quote: Men who have a pierced ear are better prepared for marriage - they've experienced pain and bought jewelry
en_quotes.author: Rita Rudner

en_quotes.quote: My thoughts on gay marriage are that everyone has the right to love and be loved, and that's the position I take
en_quotes.author: Nick Jonas

en_quotes.quote: Marriage is a beautiful thing if two people work on it and want to be together
en_quotes.author: Jennifer Winget

en_quotes.quote: Never get married in college; it's hard to get a start if a prospective employer finds you've already made one mistake
en_quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

en_quotes.quote: Yes, I am seeking a husband. As soon as the right man asks me, I shall say, 'It is not good for a woman to live alone.'
en_quotes.author: Anna Held

en_quotes.quote: Marriage should be a duet - when one sings, the other claps
en_quotes.author: Joe Murray

en_quotes.quote: She's been married so many times she has rice marks on her face
en_quotes.author: Henny Youngman

en_quotes.quote: No man is regular in his attendance at the House of Commons until he is married
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

en_quotes.quote: If there is such a thing as a good marriage, it is because it resembles friendship rather than love
en_quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

en_quotes.quote: I believe the home and marriage is the foundation of our society and must be protected
en_quotes.author: Billy Graham

en_quotes.quote: An affair now and then is good for a marriage. It adds spice, stops it from getting boring... I ought to know
en_quotes.author: Bette Davis

en_quotes.quote: Til marriage and motherhood happened, I was devoted to my work. I didn't see anything beyond it
en_quotes.author: Sridevi

en_quotes.quote: Many a man in love with a dimple makes the mistake of marrying the whole girl
en_quotes.author: Stephen Leacock

en_quotes.quote: Gay marriage is going to happen. It must
en_quotes.author: Lady Gaga

en_quotes.quote: I'll say this: The media wasn't invited to my marriage, and they're definitely not invited into the divorce
en_quotes.author: Ryan Reynolds

en_quotes.quote: When I get married, it'll be no secret
en_quotes.author: Elvis Presley

en_quotes.quote: In the course of a marriage, one accommodates the other
en_quotes.author: Ruth Bader Ginsburg

en_quotes.quote: Marriage is really tough because you have to deal with feelings... and lawyers
en_quotes.author: Richard Pryor

en_quotes.quote: Marriage is an adventure, like going to war
en_quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

en_quotes.quote: And in a marriage you can't TRY and be married. You're married or you're not married... as far as I'm concerned
en_quotes.author: Ringo Starr

en_quotes.quote: Marriage is the death of hope
en_quotes.author: Woody Allen

en_quotes.quote: I still believe in love. I believe in marriage
en_quotes.author: Usher

en_quotes.quote: Marriage is like paying an endless visit in your worst clothes
en_quotes.author: J. B. Priestley

en_quotes.quote: I think that sense of humor is important in marriage. A sense of humor gets people through marriage
en_quotes.author: Kyle Chandler

en_quotes.quote: If traditional marriage is not the law of the land, the institution of the family will cease to exist
en_quotes.author: James Dobson

en_quotes.quote: Of course I love being in love - but it is marriage that really fulfills me. But not in every case
en_quotes.author: Zsa Zsa Gabor

en_quotes.quote: Marriage isn't a carnival ride
en_quotes.author: Aisha Tyler

en_quotes.quote: The biggest financial pitfall in life is divorce. And the biggest reason for divorce is marriage
en_quotes.author: Gene Simmons

en_quotes.quote: I swear Kim Kardashian's first marriage lasted longer than some of my iPhone chargers
en_quotes.author: Lilly Singh

en_quotes.quote: For marriage to be a success, every woman and every man should have her and his own bathroom. The end
en_quotes.author: Catherine Zeta-Jones

en_quotes.quote: Marriage has made me a lot happier and I'm deeply in love with my wife, and I thank God for her every day
en_quotes.author: Harry Connick, Jr.

en_quotes.quote: Maintaining marriage seems to be tougher than fatherhood: apparently it's the most difficult thing in the world
en_quotes.author: Kelly Slater

en_quotes.quote: Marriage is a mistake every man should make
en_quotes.author: George Jessel
